channel.title: How to make a portal teleport

item.title: How to make a portal teleport
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

Delta is easy, look at this for my minigame that I’m making

if ((objectID == 4408) && (objectX == 2851) && (objectY == 3670)) { teleEffect = 3; sendQuest("Soul Wars...", 2470); triggerTele(2853, 3675, 0); sM("Under construction...");

Basicly you need to give the location of the portal, for instance, it is at 1112 2394 you state

			if ((objectID == 4408) && (objectX == 1112) && (objectY == 2394)) {

Before anything else!

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a portal teleport

item.title: How to make a portal teleport

item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

[quote=“pure kirk, post:1, topic:274436”]so I want to add this code
case 2468:
teleportToX = 3153;
teleportToY = 3923;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Home.”);
break;
where would i add this in my client.java :s[/quote]
dont think you would, it would be in clickingmost class or something like that depending on your source.
